content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible price. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is newly built and unfurnished, and its location is in the city center with close proximity to important facilities, I think a price of 500 Euros per month would be reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your reasons, I understand. Let's try again. I propose 550 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Here's a higher offer: 600 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Here's a higher offer: 650 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Here's a higher offer: 700 Euros per month.
